data.lyric:
[ti:The Other Guy]
[ar:Luke Combs]
[al:What You See Ain't Always What You Get (Deluxe Edition)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]The Other Guy - Luke Combs
[00:04.59]Lyrics by： Luke Combs/Brandon Kinney/Robert Williford
[00:09.19]Composed by： Luke Combs/Brandon Kinney/Robert Williford
[00:13.79]She said I never thought I'd see you here
[00:18.00]Hanging on this side of town
[00:21.11]What's it been about a year
[00:24.81]Yeah boy look at you now
[00:27.60]I heard you got a new job
[00:29.89]Things are taking off
[00:31.49]Just like I thought they would
[00:34.38]I said it's all good
[00:37.98]But you should see the other guy that's missing you
[00:41.97]Late at night he's wishing you would come back home
[00:48.52]Girl he can't move on
[00:51.81]And his heart still takes a beating
[00:55.05]Just living with your leaving
[00:58.60]Yeah it might look like I'm doing alright
[01:04.95]But you should see the other guy
[01:11.87]As far as anyone can see
[01:15.16]Things are looking up these days
[01:18.18]Only let 'em see this side of me
[01:22.52]The one that's got it made
[01:25.00]Doing everything I know to do
[01:27.57]To keep the truth
[01:29.48]From running through my mind
[01:31.62]Yeah I'm doing fine
[01:35.34]But you should see the other guy that's missing you
[01:39.62]Late at night he's wishing you would come back home
[01:45.86]Girl he can't move on
[01:49.50]And his heart still takes a beating
[01:52.63]Just living with your leaving
[01:55.92]Yeah it might look like I'm doing alright
[02:02.24]But you should see the other guy
[02:15.95]But you should see the other guy that's missing you
[02:20.01]Late at night he's wishing you would come back home
[02:26.45]Girl he can't move on
[02:30.09]And his heart still takes a beating
[02:33.25]Just living with your leaving
[02:36.50]Yeah it might look like I'm doing alright
[02:43.29]It might look like I'm doing alright
[02:49.47]But you should see the other guy
[02:56.24]Oh you should see the other guy
data.trans:
[ti:The Other Guy]
[ar:Luke Combs]
[al:What You See Ain't Always What You Get (Deluxe Edition)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.59]//
[00:09.19]//
[00:13.79]她说 没想到会在这儿见到你
[00:18.00]你竟然会来到镇子的这边
[00:21.11]我们有多久没见了 大概一年？
[00:24.81]小子 看看你现在多风光
[00:27.60]我听说你找了份新工作
[00:29.89]日子越过越好
[00:31.49]正如我所预料的一样
[00:34.38]我说过一切都会变好
[00:37.98]但你应该看看另一个对你朝思暮想的家伙
[00:41.97]深夜 他还在苦苦盼望你能回去家里
[00:48.52]女孩 他无法放下你走向未来
[00:51.81]他的心仍然为你而跳动
[00:55.05]在失去你的痛苦中苟延残喘地生活
[00:58.60]是 或许看上去我过得不错
[01:04.95]但你应该看看另一个家伙
[01:11.87]在所有人眼里
[01:15.16]这些日子我过得越来越好
[01:18.18]我只让他们看到了我的这一面
[01:22.52]那个我努力捏造出的自己
[01:25.00]我用尽一切办法
[01:27.57]维持表面的真实
[01:29.48]我绞尽了脑汁
[01:31.62]是的 我过得很好
[01:35.34]但你应该看看另一个对你朝思暮想的家伙
[01:39.62]深夜 他还在苦苦盼望你能回去
[01:45.86]女孩 他无法放下你走向未来
[01:49.50]他的心仍然为你而跳动
[01:52.63]在失去你的痛苦中苟延残喘地生活
[01:55.92]是 或许看上去我过得不错
[02:02.24]但你应该看看另一个家伙
[02:15.95]但你应该看看另一个对你朝思暮想的家伙
[02:20.01]深夜 他还在苦苦盼望你能回去
[02:26.45]女孩 他无法放下你走向未来
[02:30.09]他的心仍然为你而跳动
[02:33.25]在失去你的痛苦中苟延残喘地生活
[02:36.50]是 或许看上去我过得不错
[02:43.29]或许看上去我过得不错
[02:49.47]但你应该看看另一个家伙
[02:56.24]你应该看看另一个家伙
